mapper.insert: insert into checklist (projectnum, checkcontent, isdeleted) values (#{projectNum},#{checkContent}, 0)
mapper.update: update checklist set checkcontent=#{checkContent} where checknum=#{checkNum} and projectnum=#{projectNum}
